metadata.title: USN-5799-1 -- Linux kernel (OEM) vulnerability
metadata.description: Kyle Zeng discovered that the sysctl implementation in the Linux kernel contained a stack-based buffer overflow. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5799-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-modules-5.17.0-1026-oem - 5.17.0-1026.27 linux-oem-5.17-tools-host - 5.17.0-1026.27 linux-tools-5.17.0-1026-oem - 5.17.0-1026.27 linux-image-unsigned-5.17.0-1026-oem - 5.17.0-1026.27 linux-oem-5.17-headers-5.17.0-1026 - 5.17.0-1026.27 linux-oem-5.17-tools-5.17.0-1026 - 5.17.0-1026.27 linux-headers-5.17.0-1026-oem - 5.17.0-1026.27 linux-modules-iwlwifi-5.17.0-1026-oem - 5.17.0-1026.27 linux-buildinfo-5.17.0-1026-oem - 5.17.0-1026.27 linux-image-5.17.0-1026-oem - 5.17.0-1026.27 No subscription required  linux-headers-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1026.24 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1026.24 linux-image-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1026.24 linux-image-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1026.24 linux-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1026.24 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1026.24 linux-tools-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1026.24 linux-headers-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1026.24 linux-tools-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1026.24 linux-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1026.24 No subscription required  linux-modules-iwlwifi-6.0.0-1010-oem - 6.0.0-1010.10 linux-tools-6.0.0-1010-oem - 6.0.0-1010.10 linux-headers-6.0.0-1010-oem - 6.0.0-1010.10 linux-image-6.0.0-1010-oem - 6.0.0-1010.10 linux-oem-6.0-headers-6.0.0-1010 - 6.0.0-1010.10 linux-oem-6.0-tools-6.0.0-1010 - 6.0.0-1010.10 linux-modules-6.0.0-1010-oem - 6.0.0-1010.10 linux-buildinfo-6.0.0-1010-oem - 6.0.0-1010.10 linux-modules-ipu6-6.0.0-1010-oem - 6.0.0-1010.10 linux-modules-ivsc-6.0.0-1010-oem - 6.0.0-1010.10 linux-oem-6.0-tools-host - 6.0.0-1010.10 linux-image-unsigned-6.0.0-1010-oem - 6.0.0-1010.10 No subscription required  linux-headers-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1010.10 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1010.10 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1010.10 linux-image-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1010.10 linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1010.10 linux-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1010.10 linux-tools-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1010.10 No subscription required
